synopsis.text: Chicago's roads are ruled by Bean Bandit, a skilled courier who's not afraid to play both sides of the law. With his trusted partner Rally Vincent and his custom sports car 'Roadbuster', Bean will transport anything or anyone for the right price. When he's hired to bring home a kidnapped girl named Chelsea, Bean finds himself framed for the crime. Unbeknownst to him, his former clients Semmerling and Carrie are planning their escape with Chelsea's father and the ransom money. With relentless Inspector Percy hot on his tail, Bean must uncover the truth and clear his name, all while leaving the Chicago Police Department with a hefty auto repair bill. This one-episode OAV, from the creator of Gunsmith Cats, promises a thrilling ride with the bulletproof Bean Bandit.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
